5.17. hlp_header Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block hlp_header
  table
  !endblock

The table fields are:

Field Category Rule
Text key  
Kind optional <popup|jump>

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The hlp_header filter is used to define a table of jumps within the non-scrolling region of a Windows help topic.
